docs.title: HSE Performance Standard Analysis
docs.text:
Welcome to the HSE Analysis Reports portal. This is where we'll store the outputs of the automated analysis of the HSE Performance Standard (HSE PS) documents.

Navigation

Each Class folder will have an exception report per Performance Standard as we get them.

docs.title: Current File Status
docs.text:
• GT Drillships ❌ - only 2 rigs, missing GT II data
  • Gusto P10000 - HHI ☑️
  • JU - CJ-50 ❌ - 3 rig folders, all empty
  • JU-CJ-70 ❌ - 5 rigs (2 empty, 2 only a couple files, 1 complete set)
  • JU-3000 ☑️
  • Samsung 96K ❌ - one full set - others blank
  • Samsung 12000 🟠 - data present, but only one rig? No comparison available
  • Semi-Submersibles ❌ - 9 rigs, all blank folders

docs.title: Water Mist System | frequency: 5Y
docs.text: Variation Type Content / Diff Rigs 🔵 Baseline description: Confirm the water mist pumps are able to deliver designed capacity of water through the test line. In the case of NToM it supposed to be 110m3/hr @ 17 bar. - Water mist system pumps are able to simultaneously supply designed capacity of water through the test line - for NToM 110m3/hr @ 17 bar.pass_criteria: Noble Sam Croft, Noble Don Taylor, Noble Tom Madden 🔴 Variance description: Confirm the water mist pumps are able to deliver designed capacity of water through the test line. In the case of NBD it supposed to be 110m3/hr @ 17 bar. - Water mist system pumps are able to simultaneously supply designed capacity of water through the test line - for NBD 110m3/hr @ 17 bar.pass_criteria: Noble Bob Douglas

docs.title: Assurance Activities Consistency
docs.text: Inconsistencies Found: 2 items

docs.title: Ventilation System - Hazardous Areas | frequency: 3M
docs.text: Variation Type Content / Diff Rigs 🔵 Baseline description: Shut down ventilation in enclosed hazardous areas- Mud pit room;- Shaker house; and- any other enclosed hazardous areas in line with the hazardous area plan.Confirm that it initiates an alarm in a manned stations, when the pressure differential is less than 50 Pa.pass_criteria: Confirmed that loss of hazardous area ventilation leads to an alarm in a manned station. Noble Mick O'Brien, Noble Regina Allen 🔴 Variance description: Shut down ventilation in enclosed hazardous areas- Mud pit room;- Shaker house; and- any other enclosed hazardous areas in line with the hazardous area plan.Confirm that it initiates an alarm in a manned stations, when the pressure differential is less than 50Pa.pass_criteria: Confirmed that loss of hazardous area ventilation leads to an alarm in a manned station. Noble Tom Prosser

docs.title: Ventilation System - Non hazardous Areas | frequency: 3M
docs.text: Variation Type Content / Diff Rigs 🔵 Baseline description: Overpressure is maintained at:- Driller's Cabin- Other enclosed non-hazardous areas adjacent to hazardous areas as shown on Hazardous Area plan. Confirm that an alarm is given at manned station upon loss of pressure differential for non-hazardous rooms adjacent to hazardous areas. This can be tested by shutting off the ventilation or by keeping doors open until the pressure is equalised.pass_criteria: Confirmed that loss in differential pressure leads to an alarm in a manned station. Noble Mick O'Brien, Noble Regina Allen 🔴 Variance description: Overpressure is maintained at:- Driller's Cabin- Other enclosed non-hazardous areas adjacent to hazardous areas as shown on Hazardous Area plan. Confirm that an alarm is given at manned station upon loss of pressure differential for non-hazardous rooms adjacent to hazardous areas. This can be tested by shutting off the ventilation or by keeping doors open until the pressure is equalised.pass_criteria: Confirmed that loss of differential pressure leads to an alarm in a manned station. Noble Tom Prosser

docs.title: Technical Perf Requirements Existence

docs.title: Ventilation system - Galley
docs.text: Variation Type Content / Diff Rigs 🔵 Baseline requirement: Upon activiation of water mist in the galley, the ICMS (Kongsberg) shall automatically shut down the air handling units and exhaust fan and close related dampers as per F&G Cause and Effects. Noble Regina Allen ⚪ Missing (Item not present for these rigs) Noble Tom Prosser, Noble Mick O'Brien

docs.title: Ventilation system - Galley Areas protected by water mist
docs.text: Variation Type Content / Diff Rigs 🔵 Baseline requirement: Upon activiation of water mist in the galley, the ICMS (Kongsberg) shall automatically shut down the relevant air handling units and exhaust fan and close related dampers as per F&G Cause and Effects. Noble Tom Prosser, Noble Mick O'Brien ⚪ Missing (Item not present for these rigs) Noble Regina Allen
